titleStmt.title: Eleutherosis tēs aletheias, truth asserted by the doctrine and practice of the apostles, seconded by the testimony of synods, fathers, and doctors, from the apostles to this day viz. that episcopacie is jure divino / by Sir Francis Wortley ...
titleStmt.author: Wortley, Francis, Sir, 1591-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.N. for J.K. and T.W. ...,

notesStmt.note: First three words of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
